  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RECEIVED A CALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE UNLOAD WALL. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER IDENTIFIED SAID LEAKING PACKAGE, PLACED SAID PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY FOR TRANSPORT, AND TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024030475
item.description:
Report X-2024030475

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-06
  • City: TUCSON
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered inside a trailer with no visible damage on the first flap leaking out of the bottom. DescribePack: 1.5-inch crack on the bottom left corner of the frontside of plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was places in a bag inside a red storage plastic container.

item.title: Report X-2024030253
item.description:
Report X-2024030253

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-03
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was sent through the overhead sorters where the top of one of the bottles became loose and started to leak. The package was placed in a hazmat bag lined tote and brought to the QA area for processing. DescribePack: One of the bottle tops came loose and leaked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in the upright position and the bottle top was tightened down

item.title: Report X-2024030255
item.description:
Report X-2024030255

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-03
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was coming from the unload area when it was noticed that the bottom of the box was wet. The lids of two bottles came loose during the shipping process causing the bottles to leak. DescribePack: The tops of 2 bottles leaked DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The bottle tops were tightened down

item.title: Report X-2024030254
item.description:
Report X-2024030254

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-03
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was being unloaded when it toppled off the rollers and onto the dock upside down causing one of the tops to completely come off the plastic bottle and all of the liquid spilled out. The top may have become loose during the shipping process. DescribePack: One bottle top came off DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The wet package was placed in a hazmat bag lined tote and brought to the QA area for processing.

item.title: Report X-2024030256
item.description:
Report X-2024030256

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-03
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME TOO QA IN A HAZMAT LINED TOTE. IT WAS SECURED USING PROPER PPE TOLLS AND ATTIRE. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE WAS CRACKED ON BOTTOM OF THE PLASTIC BUCKET AND LEAKING SMALL AMOUNTS OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: WHEN PACKAGE WAS NOTICE PACKAGE WAS PUT INSIDE A HAZMAT LINED TOTE TO STOP THE SPILLAGE.

item.title: Report X-2024030286
item.description:
Report X-2024030286

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-04
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was brought to the damage area for further investigation by certified personnel. Upon inspection there was some air space at the top of the item which caused contents to move around during shipping. Eventually, the bottle holding the contents broke during transit. All of the contents leaked out. DescribePack: There entire glass bottle shattered due to improperly packing of contents. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: The package was brought to damage area for further inspected by trained personnel. The box was places in a red hazmat tote lined with a bag to reduce the release of the liquids.

item.title: Report X-2024030316
item.description:
Report X-2024030316

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-04
  • City: TEMPE
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Loose caps caused inner containers to leak and damage outer container. DescribePack: Inner container caps were loose and started to leak during shipment damaging the outer container DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into lined HazMat tote with orientation arrows up, and placed into the vent in the HazMat cage.

item.title: Report X-2024030257
item.description:
Report X-2024030257

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-03
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Upon inspection package was soiled on half of the base. Inside the package was 2 plastic bottles of Zep Industrial degreaser. One bottle had a loose cap causing it to leak it's contents and soil the package. Package was placed inside hazmat bag and tote and processed in Hazmat cage. DescribePack: The cap on one of the plastic bottles had a loose cap causing it to leak it's contents. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a hazmat bag and tote upon discovery, to prevent package from damaging other packages within the vicinity.
